instrumentation: soprano, alto, bass, choir (SATB), 2 oboes, 2 violins, 2 obbligato violins, viola, continuo
notes: Composed for the third Sunday after Epiphany. The opening chorus was later used for the Gloria of the Missa in G minor, BWV 235.

movements.title: O selger Christ, der allzeit seinen Willen
Mit allem, was ich hab und bin
Mein Jesus will es tun, er will dein Kreuz versüßen
Was mein Gott will, das g'scheh allzeit
